name: OR_LOG_RSN_PRI_INAD_PROC
description: Contains the reason why a prior procedure was inadequate and why this procedure is being performed.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RSN_PRI_INAD_PROC_C_NAME
columns.description: Reason why a prior procedure was inadequate and why this procedure is being performed.
